%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.expression:
IF(%InputValues:PR-FilesCount% == 3,    
    AND(
        OR(
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg", 
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpeg",                        
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xls",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xlsx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
        ),
        OR(
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg", 
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpeg",                        
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xls",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xlsx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
        ),
        OR(
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg", 
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpeg",                        
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xls",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xlsx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|3:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
        )
    ),
    IF(%InputValues:PR-FilesCount% == 2,
        AND(
            OR(
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg", 
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpeg",                        
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xls",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xlsx",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
            ),
            OR(
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg", 
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpeg",                        
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xls",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xlsx",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
            )
        ),
        IF(%InputValues:PR-FilesCount% = 1,
            OR(
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg", 
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpeg",                        
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xls",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "xlsx",
                CASE(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%InputValues:FileProcedure|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
            ),
            true
        )
    )
)
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: Formula4
